sentences.en: a monumental contribution to the field of medicine
sentences.cn: 对医学领域的重大贡献

sentences.en: By any measure, it was a monumental achievement.
sentences.cn: 用任何标准来衡量, 这都是一件了不起的成就.

sentences.en: Charles Darwin’s monumental study, ‘The Origin of Species’
sentences.cn: 查尔斯•达尔文的不朽著作《物种起源》

sentences.en: For its time this structure is a monumental achievement in the ingenuity of its design.
sentences.cn: 当时,这个结构在设计创新方面非常成功.

sentences.en: I had a monumental run-in with him a couple of years ago.
sentences.cn: 几年前，我和他大吵了一架。

sentences.en: I take no real interest in monumental sculpture.
sentences.cn: 我对高大的雕塑没什么兴趣。

sentences.en: In his monumental work begun in 1666 , Newton discovered three vital facts about the gravitational force.
sentences.cn: 牛顿在他开始于一六六六年的不朽的工作中,发现了有关万有引力的三个极其重要的事实.

sentences.en: It is his monumental work on Chinese astronomy.
sentences.cn: 这是他关于中国天文学的不朽著作。

sentences.en: It was a case of monumental bad - manners.
Paisal's palace was on a monumental scale.
sentences.cn: 费萨尔的宫殿十分宏伟壮观.

sentences.en: Some artists challenge the architectural space with their monumental paintings.
sentences.cn: 有些艺术家用巨幅画作来挑战建筑空间.

sentences.en: The most monumental human constructions are the Pyramids at Giza.
sentences.cn: 人类最有意义的建筑莫过于位于吉扎的金字塔.

sentences.en: They are arguing about the document of the monumental i argument.
sentences.cn: 他们在辩论关于那件不朽乐器的文献.

sentences.en: They are like human beings with marble poured over them, smooth, white, monumental.
sentences.cn: 象是活人身上敷了一层云石, 光滑 、 洁白 、 巍巍然.

sentences.en: They are not arguing about the document of the monumental instrument.
sentences.cn: 她们在辩论涉及那件不朽乐器的文献.

sentences.en: This monumental pillar was built in memory of a great navy victory.
sentences.cn: 这根纪念柱是为纪念一场海战的大胜而建的.

sentences.en: Your arrogance back then was said to be monumental.
sentences.cn: 你那时的傲慢据说是出了名的.

words.tran_cn: 纪念碑；历史遗迹；不朽的作品

trans.tran_cn: 不朽的，纪念碑的，非常的
trans.tran_en: relating to a monument or built as a monument
